chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A), (forall (a : A) (b1 b2 : B), f (f a b1) b2 = f (f a b2) b1) -> forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list B), permutation l1 l2 -> fold_left f l1 a = fold_left f l2 a

Premises:
fold_left : forall A B : Type, (A -> B -> A) -> list B -> A -> A
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
permutation : forall A : Type, list A -> list A -> Prop
fold_left_init : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (h : A -> A), (forall (a : A) (b : B), h (f a b) = f (h a) b) -> forall (a : A) (l : list B), fold_left f l (h a) = h (fold_left f l a)
fold_left_eta : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (l : list B) (a : A) (f1 : A -> B -> A), (forall (a0 : A) (b : B), In b l -> f a0 b = f1 a0 b) -> fold_left f l a = fold_left f1 l a
fold_left_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (C : Type) (a : A) (l : list C) (k : C -> B), fold_left f (map k l) a = fold_left (fun (a0 : A) (b : C) => f a0 (k b)) l a
partition_cons2 : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (a : A) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> f a = false -> partition f (a :: l) = (l1, a :: l2)
permutation_map_ex : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 : list A) (l2 : list B), permutation (map f l1) l2 -> exists l3 : list A, permutation l3 l1 /\ l2 = map f l3
partition_cons1 : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (a : A) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> f a = true -> partition f (a :: l) = (a :: l1, l2)
permutation_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation (map f l1) (map f l2)
permutation_flat_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> list B) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation (flat_map f l1) (flat_map f l2)
map_ext : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> forall l : list A, map f l = map g l
permutation_map_ex_aux : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 : list B) (l3 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> l1 = map f l3 -> exists l4 : list A, permutation l4 l3 /\ l2 = map f l4
in_flat_map_in : forall (B C : Type) (l : list B) (f : B -> list C) (a : C) (b : B), In a (f b) -> In b l -> In a (flat_map f l)
fold_left_rev_right : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> B) (l : list A) (i : B), fold_right f i (rev l) = fold_left (fun (x : B) (y : A) => f y x) l i
fold_left_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (l l' : list B) (i : A), fold_left f (l ++ l') i = fold_left f l' (fold_left f l i)
map_ext_in : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> map f l = map g l
permutation_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), P [] [] -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P [] [] -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
fold_right_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> B) (l l' : list A) (i : B), fold_right f i (l ++ l') = fold_right f (fold_right f i l') l
in_map_inv : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (l : list A), In b (map f l) -> exists a : A, In a l /\ b = f a
filter_ext_in : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> filter f l = filter g l
permutation_cons_ex_aux : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> forall l11 l12 : list A, l1 = l11 ++ a :: l12 -> exists l3 l4 : list A, l2 = l3 ++ a :: l4 /\ permutation (l11 ++ l12) (l3 ++ l4)
fold_symmetric : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> A -> A), (forall x y z : A, f x (f y z) = f (f x y) z) -> forall a0 : A, (forall y : A, f a0 y = f y a0) -> forall l : list A, fold_left f l a0 = fold_right f a0 l
in_flat_map_ex : forall (B C : Type) (l : list B) (f : B -> list C) (a : C), In a (flat_map f l) -> exists b : B, In b l /\ In a (f b)
permutation_cons_ex : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation (a :: l1) l2 -> exists l3 l4 : list A, l2 = l3 ++ a :: l4 /\ permutation l1 (l3 ++ l4)
filter_ext : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> forall l : list A, filter f l = filter g l
permutation_one_inv_aux : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> forall a : A, l1 = [a] -> l2 = [a]

```coq
intros A B f Hf a l1 l2 Hperm.
induction Hperm.
- reflexivity.
- simpl. rewrite IHperm. auto.
- simpl. rewrite IHperm1, IHperm2. auto.
Qed.
```
